title: It's About Time
episode_desc: When Mark Grayson finally inherits powers from his superhero father, it's a dream come true. But there's more to being a hero than just choosing a name and costume.
show_desc: An adult animated series based on the Skybound/Image comic about a teenager whose father is the most powerful superhero on the planet.

title: Here Goes Nothing
episode_desc: With his father out of action, Mark struggles to defend the city against an interdimensional invasion, joining forces with a team of teenage superheroes.
show_desc: An adult animated series based on the Skybound/Image comic about a teenager whose father is the most powerful superhero on the planet.

title: Who You Calling Ugly?
episode_desc: Mark has to cut a study date short to help save Mount Rushmore from a crazed scientist. Robot deals with Action - Comic as he assembles a new team of world-saving superheroes.
show_desc: An adult animated series based on the Skybound/Image comic about a teenager whose father is the most powerful superhero on the planet.

title: Neil Armstrong, Eat Your Heart Out
episode_desc: It's two firsts for Mark: a first date and a first trip to another planet. At the same time, Nolan and Debbie revisit their own first vacation together.
show_desc: An adult animated series based on the Skybound/Image comic about a teenager whose father is the most powerful superhero on the planet.

title: That Actually Hurt
episode_desc: Feeling confident in his new abilities, Mark risks a team-up with a local villain to take down a crime lord, while simultaneously juggling school and a new relationship.

title: You Look Kinda Dead
episode_desc: Mark joins William and Amber on a campus visit to Upstate University, hoping to discover a new future for himself. Debbie makes her own disturbing discovery.
